column4: I need to restart a remote computer, how can I send a message to the users x windows that the system is being rebooted, and they need to save all their work?
I did, but it doesn't send a message to the users desktop that the system is being rebooted.
If the user has a console open, they will see the message, but if they don't, I want a dialog box to open up on the users desktop notifying them that they need to save work.
